summary: This document is a search and seizure warrant issued for Little Saint James Island in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It authorizes law enforcement to search the premises and any structures or containers located there, with a deadline for execution by August 24, 2019. The warrant includes provisions for delayed notification to the property owner.

persons.name: Ruth Miller
persons.context: Ruth Miller is the judge who signed the search warrant for Little Saint James Island.

events.title: Search and Seizure Warrant Execution
events.description: Law enforcement is authorized to execute a search warrant on Little Saint James Island.

locations: Little Saint James Island, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The search warrant was issued for Little Saint James Island.
The warrant allows for the search of any buildings, structures, or containers on the island.
The execution of the warrant must occur on or before August 24, 2019.
The warrant includes provisions for delayed notification to the property owner.
Ruth Miller is the United States Magistrate Judge who authorized the warrant.
